text: Richard Harrison Smith (July 21, 1926 – January 25, 2021) was an American professional baseball player. He appeared in 70 games over parts of five Major League Baseball seasons (1951–1955) as a member of the Pittsburgh Pirates. Smith was born in Blandburg, Pennsylvania. Smith died on January 25, 2021 in Boalsburg, Pennsylvania at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: Dick Smith (third baseman)
